original_text: If the animal is a male sheep, you must also offer 2 kilograms of flour. Mix this flour with 1.5 litres of olive oil.
korean_text: 숫양이면 소제로 고운 가루 십분의 이에 기름 삼분의 일 힌을 섞어 준비하고

sentences.original_text: If the animal is a male sheep,
you must also offer 2 kilograms of flour.
Mix this flour with 1.5 litres of olive oil.
